isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - WHEEL AND WHEEL ASSEMBLIES REMOVAL AND INSTALLATION - DISC WHEELS (INSTALLATION)

svcproc.title: DISC WHEELS (INSTALLATION)

step1.para: Installation of wheel and tire assembly is essentially the reverse of the removal procedure. Special attention must be given to the following:

step2.para: Before mounting wheel assemblies on vehicles, be sure all parts are clean and free from foreign matter. Excess paint on wheel stud hole perimeters can cause wheel mounting nuts to loosen with use.
Be certain wheel stud threads are clean to allow correct torquing of nuts. Do not apply any lubricant on threads.

step1.para: Install wheel assembly. Refer to INSTALLATION, TIGHTENING AND ALIGNMENT.

svcproc.para: Refer to TORQUE CHART for correct torque values for wheel nuts.
